it.polimi.se2018.network

Interface RoomDispatcherInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleRoomDispatcherImplementation

    public interface RoomDispatcherInterface
extends java.lang.Runnable
    Runnable process that manages the rooms

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<ConnectedClient> getAllConnectedClients()
      Returns the set of all the clients connected to the server

      void sendGameStateToReconnectedClient(int id)

    • Method Detail

      • handleClient

        java.lang.Integer handleClient(ClientInterface clientInterface,
                               java.lang.String name)
        Handles a new client given by a gatherer
        Parameters:
        clientInterface - interface of the client
        name - name of the player who wants to be registered
        Returns:
        the id representing univocally the client/player in the server

      • heartbeat

        void heartbeat(HeartbeatMessage heartbeatMessage)
        Notifies a specific room about a new heartbeat
        Parameters:
        heartbeatMessage - message containing all the informations to notify a new heartbeat

      • stopDispatcher

        Stops this process

      • getRoomForId

        Room getRoomForId(int id)
        Returns the room where a specific client is
        Parameters:
        id - integer univocally representing a client
        Returns:
        the room where a specific client is

      • reconnectClient

        java.lang.Boolean reconnectClient(ClientInterface clientInterface,
                                  int id)
        Asks to the respective room to reconnect an already connected player
        Parameters:
        clientInterface - interface of the client
        id - integer given to the client during the call to registerClient
        Returns:
        true if the client reconnected successfully, false if not
